definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be quiet, undisturbed (Targum [[שְׁקַט]] (rare); NH [[שׁקט]] is sink down; Ar. saqat.a is drop down);—

of land, at peace, abs. Ju Jdg 3:11, Jdg 3:30, Jdg 5:31, Jdg 8:28, Is 14:7 (+[[נׇ֫חָה]]), 2Ch 13:23; +[[מִמִּלְחָמָה]] Jos 11:23, Jos 14:15 (D ?), cf. v:Jos 14:5 (P); [[וּשְׁלֵוׇה]] ´[[וְשׁ]]: 1Ch 4:40; of earth, ´[[ישֶׁבֶת וְשׁ]]: Zec 1:11; abs. of city 2Ki 11:20 = 2Ch 23:21, kingdom 2Ch 20:30, +[[לִפְנֵי]] pers. 2Ch 14:4; of people, [[וּבׂטֵחַ]] ´[[שׁ]]: in peace and security Ju Jdg 18:7, Jdg 18:27, [[הַשּׁׂקְטִים ישְׁבֵי לָבֶָטַח]] Ez Eze 38:11; +[[שַׁאֲנַן]] Je 30:10 = Je 46:27; of Moab, [[וְשׁׂקֵט]]…[[שַׁאֲנַן]]: [[אֶל־שְׁמָרָיו]] Je 48:11 undisturbed upon its lees (fig. of wine); of Job, quiet in death Job 3:13, be at rest (from apprehensions of evil) v:Job 3:26 (+[[שָׁלַוְתִּי]], [[נׇ֫חְתִּי]]).

be quiet, inactive: of ´[[וְאַבִּיטָהêי]]: Is 18:4 I will be quiet and gaze, i.e. gaze as an inactive spectator, Ps 83:2 (‖[[דמה ]], [[חרשׁ]] be silent); = be pacified Ez Eze 16:42; of sword of ´[[י]]: Je 47:6, Je 47:7; of Boaz Ru 3:18 he will not be quiet until he has finished the matter; of prophet Is 62:l (‖[[חָשָׁה ]] be silent).

shew quietness (inner causat.), of men Is 7:4 (+[[אַל־תִּירָא]]), of sea Is 57:20 = Je 49:23, earth Job 37:17 ( +[[מִדָּרוֹם]]); hence Inf. abs. = subst., quietness, display of quietness Is 30:15, [[עֲבׂדַת הַצְּדָקָה הַשְׁקֵט וׇבֶ֫טַח]] Is 32:17 the product of righteousness is quietness and security (Du Che:Hpt Marti del. ´[[הַצּ]]: as dittogr. from v:a, read [[הַמִּשְׁפָּט]] for [[הַשְׁקֵט]], and del. [[וׇ]]: the product of justice is security); (presumptuous) security, [[שַׁלְוַת הַשְׁקֵט]] Ez Eze 16:49 (of Sodom).
cause quietness: subj. ´[[י]]: Job 34:29, [[לְהַשְׁקִיט לוֹ מִימֵי רָָע]] Ps 94:13; pacify, allay, obj. [[רִיב]] Pr 15:18.
